constantValues: The record of the different products that the customer holds with the bank.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: availableBalance

members.description: The balance of the product at the time that the information is imported to D365 or when the information is retrieved in real-time form the backend system (such as the account balance). This is the amo

constantValues: Value of the Blocked Amount in base currency.

members.name: bookBalance

members.name: bookBalanceBase

constantValues: Value of the Book Balance in base currency.
